title: Facebook's next monopoly
description:
Can Mark Zuckerberg create a metaverse monopoly through mergers and acquisitions? Recode’s Peter Kafka explains.
Read Peter’s story here: https://www.vox.com/recode/22776461/facebook-meta-metaverse-monopoly
Today’s show was produced by Taylor Maycan, engineered by Cristian Ayala, and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.
